headline: Outpost24 Focuses on Strategic Growth with Appointment of Ariel Katz as Chief Corporate Development Officer
summary: PHILADELPHIA, August 12, 2025--Outpost24, a leading provider of cyber risk management and threat intelligence solutions, today announced the appointment of Ariel Katz as Chief Corporate Development Officer. Katz will be responsible for driving strategic growth, and identifying and executing inorganic opportunities to strengthen the company’s position as a leader in the cybersecurity market.
